tool_description: Searches for the same or similar products across multiple e-commerce platforms to find competitor prices.

product_name.description: Product name or description to search for

max_results.description: Maximum number of results per platform (1-20)

error_messages: Empty product name: Product name cannot be empty or whitespace only.
Invalid platform: One or more platforms in the list are not supported.
Max results out of range: max_results must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid price range: price_range_min must be less than price_range_max.
Search failed: Unable to perform search on one or more platforms.
No results found: No matching products found within the specified criteria.
usage: Provide product_name to search across platforms. Optionally filter by platforms, result count, and price range. Returns competitor product listings with prices.

total_found.description: Total number of competitor products found

platforms.description: Platform names for each found product
